column6: Daken is tracking down the monster who stole his healing factor â€" SIPHON â€" through the mountains of Japan, and in this tracking starts to come into his own. Incapacitated, but not alone, he encounters the Ghost Samurai! Will X-23 help Daken's new mission? Or impede it?
